snippet: ALEXANDER--Marjorie. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Marjorie Alexander, wife of the late Norman Alexander, who was a great philanthropist, who leaves behind a family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Marjorie's children, Gail Binderman, Sharon Zoffness, Dr. Mark Alexander and Leslie Alexander; her grandchildren; her great-grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: ALEXANDER--Marjorie. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Marjorie Alexander, wife of the late Norman Alexander, who was a great philanthropist, who leaves behind a family who carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Marjorie's children, Gail Binderman, Sharon Zoffness, Dr. Mark Alexander and Leslie Alexander; her grandchildren; her great-grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
